item.title: Weapon Stats Help~~~
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

[quote=“dylan.hurley, post:2, topic:426043”]In
item = 18786 Korasi’s_sword The_sword_of_a_Void_Knight. 0 0 0 60 70 -2 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 70 0
Change last 70 to make higher it ofc for other code for spec don’t expect to be spoon fed again[/quote]

How is this a spoonfeed. This is just Uping the strength…

item.title: Weapon Stats Help~~~
item.dc:creator: @DarkSuch DarkSuch
item.description:
@DarkSuch wrote:

Hello i need help changing my korasi’s hit amount.
right now it looks like this.

item = 18786 Korasi’s_sword The_sword_of_a_Void_Knight. 0 0 0 60 70 -2 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 70 0

case 18786:
c.gfx100(1224);
c.startAnimation(1872);
c.specAccuracy = 5.00;
c.specDamage = 2.00;
c.ssSpec = true;
c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
break;

how do i change that?
what do i need to do it make it hit better?

Read full topic
